## Source: ossf-package-analysis (558220ecb7cc65dd1c6bd3cb85413d458fb89da42e9ec16e2e1811a252761b15)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'webdriverio-browserstack' @ 0.2.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
